title: PRODUCT USER MANUAL Sub-regional Mediterranean Sea indicators
abstract: The “Sub-regional  Mediterranean  Sea  Indicators” tool is  dedicated  to  the  monitoring  and visualization of multivariate and sub-regional ocean indicators in the Mediterranean Sea and around the Balearic Islands(see sub-regions in Figure 1). This operational product consists in providing continuous information about the ocean state and variability from daily (events) to interannual/decadal (climate) scalesin a simple way that could be consulted by the scientific community, educators in marine science and environmental agencies.
citation: Juza,  M.,and  Tintoré,  J.  (2021).  Multivariate  sub-regional  ocean  indicators  in  the Mediterranean:  from  event  detection  to  climate  change  estimations.Frontiers  in  Marine Science, in revision.
